channel.title: Question on monsters hitting
channel.description:
If I don't have an attack animation for a monster but I want it to hit higher, do I just keep it
[code]} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ###) { hitDiff = 4 + misc.random(16);[/code]
:P I am lazy, I don't feel like compiling and going back :s
